name: Lame mage game
description:
The lame wizard finds a prophecy that speaks of the imminent apocalypse. To save everyone, he goes to Four Horsemen's ruining mansion to convince them not to destroy the world.

Game made in 3 days from scratch at https://itch.io/jam/lame-jam-26

Controls:
WAD - movement,
RMB (Single click) - Levitate objects
LMB - Shoot
F - Talk to
